SpacecraftBus¶

class orbitpy.util.SpacecraftBus(name=None, mass=None, volume=None, orientation=None, solarPanelConfig=None, _id=None)[source]¶

Class to store and handle the spacecraft bus attributes.

Variables

  • name (str) – Name of the bus.

  • mass (float) – (kg) Mass of the bus.

  • volume (float) – (m3) Volume of the bus.

  • orientation (instrupy.util.Orientation) – Bus orientation. Can be specified with respect to any one of the reference frames defined in instrupy.util.ReferenceFrame

  • solar_panel_config (str #@TODO: revise) – Solar panel configuration

  • _id (str) – Unique identifier.
